snippet: Colin Kaepernick is standing behind his decision not to vote in the presidential election or even register to take part in the democratic process, saying he can effect change in other ways besides through a ballot....
lead_paragraph: Colin Kaepernick is standing behind his decision not to vote in the presidential election or even register to take part in the democratic process, saying he can effect change in other ways besides through a ballot.

headline.main: Kaepernick Stands Behind Decision Not to Vote for President
headline.print_headline: Kaepernick Stands Behind Decision Not to Vote for President
